title: APIs made for mobile networks
summary: The Python and web development communities have gotten pretty good at writing REST APIs for browsers and desktop clients. But porting that to the high-latency wild-west of mobile networks requires a paradigm shift. Learn how you can speed up your mobile API using proven technologies - and avoid writing your own protocol!
